message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for the price of $9,500. I think it will be very valuable to you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This product is truly top-notch and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that price point. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
